channel.title: I need help!
channel.description:
Hey guys ,
I need help with my server Got a problem! I need the dragon slayer quest to wear rune plate and d hide body . but! i want to make my server that you can wear it withouth dragon slayer! thx for your time!

item.title: I need help!
item.dc:creator: @CoderOops CoderOops
item.description:
@CoderOops wrote:

you can find it easiest by searching for message which pop-ups when you’re trying to wear it.

example: it says '‘u need do da dslayer’'
Search for it in server files and you find where it states it and then just remove that part and you’re good to go.

Read full topic
